channel.title: How can i code a Deposit Box? [Delta]
channel.description: Title says it all, I'm still trying to completely learn Java and i don't know how to make a deposit box work. I placed one in my jail area (they have to mine a certain amount before being aloud leave) but it doesn't do anything since obviously it needs coded. Any help will be much appreciated

item.title: How can i code a Deposit Box? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Leggyownz Leggyownz
item.description:
@Leggyownz wrote:

i had found it at some point but i’ve gone through it like 5 times now and can’t find where i am to put this at. do you know the name of the public void i need to put this code into?

EDIT: Nvm i got it to work thanks for your help. its very much appreciated

Read full topic
item.source: How can i code a Deposit Box? [Delta]

item.title: How can i code a Deposit Box? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

It should already be on your server you just need to look. if you can’t find it you can always add it (i don’t know how) or you can just use the bank interface

EDIT: deposit interface is 4465 so try

case 9398: showInterface(4465); sM("runescape bank deposit box."); break;
make sure you put two tab spaces in front of “case 9398:” and 3 tab spaces infront of the rest.(tab button is above the caps lock key if you didn’t know)
try adding that between case 1206 and case 1207 if you have them if not just put them between any object case.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i code a Deposit Box? [Delta]

item.source: How can i code a Deposit Box? [Delta]

item.title: How can i code a Deposit Box? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

i cant remember which file its in (client.java i think) it would be something like

case *****
showInterface(****)
break;

dont use this! it is just an example i havent coded delta in a while
but just search case into client.java

EDIT: i just looked in my client.java and found something which you can use.

case 9398: openUpBank(); break;
or

case 9398: showInterface(6575); break;

that isn’t the actual interface id but it might be the correct object id
either one of those may work
you could try searching for “bank” in your client.java
you may see something like iif(command.startsWith(“bank”)
under it will be a line just copy that go down to where the other cases are then paste it between “case 9398” and “break;”
if that isn’t there just copy an other line and paste it underneath and change the case number and the middle bit.

well i hope that helped you
if you need anymore help i can help you via teamviewer or something

Read full topic
